text: IEEE 1675-2008 was a standard for broadband over power lines developed by the IEEE Standards Association. It provided electric utility companies with a comprehensive standard for safely installing hardware required for Internet access capabilities over their power lines. The standard was published 7 January 2008. The IEEE 1901 standard was another related attempt published in 2011. ==See also== *Power line communication ==External links== * * IEEE P1675 Official site Category:IEEE standards
title: IEEE 1675-2008
